q_en: What raw materials are used by Skilled Sewers?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Skilled Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group with the name "Skilled Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = 7;
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing task IDs associated with the "Skilled Sewers" working group

steps.sql: SELECT order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE id IN (8, 17, 18, 19, 23, 27, 28, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the order product IDs associated with the sewing tasks from Step2

steps.sql: SELECT product_id FROM order_product WHERE id IN (8, 17, 18, 19, 23, 27, 28, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs associated with the order products from Step3

steps.sql: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.name FROM product_material pm JOIN materials m ON pm.material_id = m.id WHERE pm.product_id IN (2, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 14, 23);
steps.description: Retrieve the material IDs and names used by the products from Step4

steps.sql: SELECT id, name FROM materials WHERE id IN (8, 12, 6, 2, 4, 10) AND type = 'origin';
steps.description: Filter the materials to only include raw materials

response:
Hello there! ðŸ˜„ It looks like the "Skilled Sewers" working group is quite busy, but when it comes to raw materials, we hit a little snag. Unfortunately, there are no raw materials listed for the products they work on. 

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! ðŸ˜Š
